column5: I was just wondering what size and kinds of sd cards do you all use in your go pro?
Get the best quality Class 10 cards you can get Mike. I only have one camera now and using two 32G cards.
EXACTLY! Don't even waste your money on anything less than a class 10, as they will make your video all choppy. If you use anything less, its like having an HDTV with an analog signal! lol
Ok that's what I needed to know as I have class 6 and the Gopro book calls for class 4 or better I will be hitting FS tomorrow.
I use uhs1 for my dslr. Faster than class 10. Not sure if its supported by go pro though  Find a canadacomputers. You can pick up class tens for under 20 bucks
i have a class 10 and class 6. I do not notice the difference when filming in 960. The class 10 is always good for piece of mind, as not all cards are rated equal I believe.
I had nothing but issues with a class 6 card that I already had. Video was all choppy. Went to a class 10, and haven't had an issue since.
I forgot to hit FS yesterday maybe I will remember today. I did get some ribs and am getting them ready for dinner today mmmmmmmmmm BBQ ribs
I had class 6 and was choppy went to a cheap 10....crappy went to a good 10 and all is well

I have not used the following cards before but these might be what your looking for   Sale ends on the 14th   http://www.futureshop.ca/en-CA/product/sandisk-sandisk-extreme-32gb-class-10-sdhc-memory-card-sdsdx-032g-x46/10174247.aspx?path=0b9f5764b99eb333abf68a9946453623en02
